purpose: To extract structured data from various sources such as documents and the web, and return it in a machine-readable format
principle: Leverages AI models and context-aware structured outputs to parse and extract specific data points from unstructured data
reusability: Offers a flexible API for integration into other systems, supports multiple data formats, and can be customized for different data extraction needs
limitations: May have limitations in handling highly complex or ambiguous data structures, performance may vary based on data source complexity
name: open-extract
description: Structured Data Extractor for AI Agents. Search your documents or the web for specific data and get it back in JSON or Markdown in a single tool call.
highlight: Structured Data Extraction from documents and web using a single tool call with JSON or Markdown outputs
